Package com.hexaware.dao

Class TaxService

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.TaxService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITaxService
public class TaxService extends Object implements ITaxService
Class TaxService Represents a service class for managing tax-related operations. This class implements the ITaxService interface.

  • Constructor Details

      public TaxService()

  • Method Details

    • CalculateTax

      public void CalculateTax()
      CalculateTax() Calculates tax for an employee based on their taxable income. Prompts the user to input tax ID, employee ID, tax year, and taxable income. Utilizes the Tax class to store the collected data, calculates the tax amount based on a fixed rate of 5%, and passes the tax information to the DAO (Data Access Object) for tax calculation.
      Specified by:
      CalculateTax in interface ITaxService

    • GetTaxById

      public void GetTaxById()
      GetTaxById() Retrieves tax information from the system based on the provided tax ID. Prompts the user to input the tax ID and utilizes the DAO (Data Access Object) to fetch the corresponding tax information.
      Specified by:
      GetTaxById in interface ITaxService

    • GetTaxesForEmployee

      public void GetTaxesForEmployee()
      GetTaxesForEmployee() Retrieves tax information associated with a specific employee from the system. Prompts the user to input the employee ID and utilizes the DAO (Data Access Object) to fetch tax information for that employee.s
      Specified by:
      GetTaxesForEmployee in interface ITaxService

    • GetTaxesForYear

      public void GetTaxesForYear()
      GetTaxesForYear() Retrieves tax information for a specific year from the system. Prompts the user to input the year and utilizes the DAO (Data Access Object) to fetch tax information for that year.
      Specified by:
      GetTaxesForYear in interface ITaxService
